 3/** @file    vsip/core/complex_decl.hpp
 4    @author  Jules Bergmann
 5    @date    2005-07-25
 6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: Declarations for [complex] complex numbers.
 7
 8    This file declares the vsip::complex and vsip::polar types (which
 9    are synonyms for std::complex and std::polar), and related
10    functions as specified in the [complex] section of the VSIPL++
11    specifiction.
12*/
13
14#ifndef VSIP_CORE_COMPLEX_DECL_HPP
15#define VSIP_CORE_COMPLEX_DECL_HPP
16
17/***********************************************************************
18  Included Files
19***********************************************************************/
20
21#include <complex>
22
23
24
25/***********************************************************************
26  Declarations
27***********************************************************************/
28
29namespace vsip
30{
31
32// ISO 14882 [lib.complex.numbers] incorporated by reference
33//
34// [lib.complex.ops]
35//   - operator+	(complex-decl.hpp)
36//   - operator-	(complex-decl.hpp)
37//   - operator*	(complex-decl.hpp)
38//   - operator/	(complex-decl.hpp)
39//   - operator!=	(complex-decl.hpp)
40//   - operator==	(complex-decl.hpp)
41//   - operator<<	(complex-decl.hpp)
42//   - operator>>	(complex-decl.hpp)
43//
44// [lib.complex.value]
45//   - real		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
46//   - imag		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
47//   - abs		(complex-decl.hpp)
48//   - arg		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
49//   - norm		(complex-decl.hpp)
50//   - conj		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
51//   - polar		(complex-decl.hpp)
52//
53// [lib.complex.transcendentals]
54//   - cos		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
55//   - cosh		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
56//   - exp		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
57//   - log		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
58//   - log10		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
59//   - pow		(fns_elementwise.hpp) (NOTE: all 4 cases handled)
60//   - sin		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
61//   - sinh		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
62//   - sqrt		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
63//   - tan		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
64//   - tanh		(fns_elementwise.hpp)
65
66
67using std::complex;
68
69// [operators]
70using std::operator+;
71using std::operator-;
72using std::operator*;
73using std::operator/;
74using std::operator!=;
75using std::operator==;
76using std::operator<<;
77using std::operator>>;
78
79
80// [value]
81using std::abs;
82using std::norm;
83using std::polar;
84
85} // namespace vsip
